snippet: The criminal case against the financier R. Allen Stanford was handed over to a jury in Houston after the prosecution and the defense finished their closing arguments in the fraud trial.
abstract: Criminal case against financier R Allen Stanford is handed over to a jury in Houston after the prosecution and the defense finish their closing arguments; if convicted, he could be sentenced to more than 20 years in prison for masterminding a $7 billion Ponzi scheme.
lead_paragraph: The criminal case against the financier R. Allen Stanford was handed over to a jury in Houston after the prosecution and the defense finished their closing arguments in the fraud trial.
